topic.title: Qodana Cloud components
topic.p: The basic entity in Qodana Cloud is an organization. Every Qodana Cloud user creates and becomes an organization member. Later, they can create additional organizations.

Each organization can contain several teams, where each team provides unified access to projects for its team members. If you run the Ultimate and Ultimate Plus linters, you can create the unlimited number of teams. If you use only the Community linters, you can create only one team in your organization.
Each project contains results of inspection carried out by %product% over a specific codebase.
